short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes junk and makes the YouTube™ Video Fullscreen. Navigate to a YouTube™ video and click the extension-button for a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple addon opens a new window when a YouTube™ video was loaded in the current tab, makes the video full screen and removes the browser controls. This is especially useful when you like to watch YouTube™ videos while working in a tiling window manager like wmii or i3.



YouTube™ is a registered trademark by Google.

Icon courtesy of Eimer
http://www.zomax.net
